News.Title: KORE Digital Reports Q1 Sales of ₹156 Crore
News.Summary: KORE Digital has reported sales of ₹156 crore for the first quarter of FY26. The company's current market capitalization stands at ₹380 crore. No additional details about the company's performance or comparisons to previous periods were provided in the news snippet.

News.Title: Kore Digital to Acquire Majority Stakes in Three Companies
News.Summary: Kore Digital has announced plans to acquire 98% ownership in three companies: Franken Telecom, KDL Realinfra, and Wolter Infratech. This move suggests a significant expansion strategy for Kore Digital, potentially diversifying its portfolio and strengthening its market position.

News.Title: KORE Digital to Acquire Majority Stakes in Three Companies
News.Summary: KORE Digital has announced plans to acquire 98% ownership in three companies: Franken Telecom, KDL Realinfra, and Wolter Infratech. This move suggests a significant expansion strategy for KORE Digital, potentially strengthening its position in the telecom and infrastructure sectors.

News.Title: Kore Digital Approves 2:1 Bonus Share Issue
News.Summary: Kore Digital has approved the issuance of bonus equity shares in a ratio of 2:1. This means shareholders will receive two additional shares for every one share they currently hold, effectively tripling their shareholding without any additional cost.
